ComicInfo.Summary:
After taking the fight to the Glarkian invaders, the nasty space vampires strike back with an even deadlier all-out next level assault! Now it’s up to Katie Carva and her comic shop crew to defend Detroit from alien invasion!!
Features 3 covers (regular, artist, and 90s style), each with a risqué variant!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Winston Young | 1 | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Winston Young | 2 | C | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Mark Whitaker | 3 | D | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Mark Whitaker | 4 | E | 90's Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Danielle Gransaull | 5 | F | Risqué 90's Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Danielle Gransaull | 6 | Note: Overall issue #23.

ComicInfo.Title: World War Detroit Part Two
